resources.string:
"Welcome to Yes Lock.


Yes Lock is a Home Launcher which comes with a inbuilt app lock. which has a very pleasing loading animations and a clean interface. If you don't like your homes screen loaded with plenty of shortcuts and God knows when you use them, than Yes lock launcher is definitely for you. But if you are one of those who likes to keep stuff on your home screen but also need an excellent app lock for your apps than you can use it as a normal lock application. 
Simply set a lock and select your fav home app.(Why not this? â˜¹ )
 The app lock section includes locking of apps, with innovative kind of passwords, for those who like to try new stuffs, here you go. But if you don't like them, than you can always go back to using traditional alphabetical passwords.

 Note: The integrated app lock works with Yes lock Launcher installed.
You can always use both, the launcher and the lock simultaneously for a better experience. 
 Thank you
-sstudio"
